ygData.subject: Re: ___JBoots___
ygData.msgSnippet: Several items over the last few weeks (Jboots and PGT most assuredly, also assorted others) have had the rate at which they spawn and load turned down by about
ygData.messageBody:
Several items over the last few weeks (Jboots and PGT most assuredly, also
assorted others) have had the rate at which they spawn and load turned down
by about 25% to 33% (give or take).

Basically, all da cool shit.... well, if it wasn't whoopin' imbalancing in
some way, it wouldn't be COOL, now would it? Dev team sees this, sez "Uh-oh,
too much of dat particular flavor be in da mix" and tweaks it a bit.
Naturally, they don't SAY this.... half the people in the game would be
pissed as hell and the other half would haul ass to that location to get it
before it is "too late."

I had to pry this info outta a Guide one night after waiting 6.5 frigging
hours for a PGT (my fourth, but hey, man's gotta eat you know?), also my
experience has been that some stuff is just not loading as frequently.

ESPECIALLY Jboots.... it just about happened overnight awhile back... expect
jboots once a day. Maybe.
